    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plainText,
                       javax.crypto.SecretKey secretKey)
                                throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                       javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                       javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        Do SHA256#RSA Encryption with certificate and key
        Parameters:
        plainText - String to encrypt
        secretKey - Key to decrypt
        Returns:
        Encrypted code as a string.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if error in exists key
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if error in padding
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if error when do block calculation.

      • encryptedKey

        public static java.lang.String encryptedKey(java.security.PublicKey pk,
                            javax.crypto.SecretKey secretKey)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Encrypt token
        Parameters:
        pk - private credential key
        secretKey - secret credential key
        Returns:
        Encrypted code in Base64
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Any error
        java.lang.Exception

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String encryptedTextKey)
        Decrypt URL Encoded and Base64 encoded token
        Parameters:
        encryptedTextKey - Encrypted token
        Returns:
        Decrypted token
